attributes.action: Privatise driving tests. The mass backlog can be reduced and people can get work
attributes.additional_details:
We need to get Britain moving and people in work . The back log fir driving tests is at the extent that instructors aren’t taking in as tests can’t be booked for up to 6 months if one is lucky to go in line every day . 
By privatisation, the government will make money through testing and accrediting private companies to the standards required . In turn private companies will start up as tests examiners and charge accordingly , people will pay dearly to get test as many job require driving skills
attributes.background: Privatise driving tests by getting private companies certified / accredited to test instructor standards so that people can obtain jobs that require use of a vehicle.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure whether you want to privatise driving tests for all new drivers, or for work-related driving requirements. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
